Riot i need to talk to you i have a huge problem!!!!!!!!!!!
I got suspended from playing league games for 2 weeks for having a bad game and this is when the april fools stuff is going on and i really love this week its my fav week all yea plz dont take it away from me,like wtf i have 4kping all game and right before this game the people that were in my champ select were calling me "fat noob" "poffffffta" also called me "gay" like riot are u doing anything to protect me or you just gonna forget about me and go on the bully's side
so riot are you gonna ban/suspended me for having a bad game, being cyber bullied?????????
Please riot listen to me unsuspended me please its no fair that you target me instead of the real problem

Post a support ticket, if its important to talk to riot, otherwise don't post your shit on a place its not welcome

TY
